1.name: Hummus with Lamb
1.description: Our signature creamy hummus topped with tender, slow-cooked lamb, toasted pine nuts, and fresh parsley. Served with warm pita bread.

2.name: Falafel Platter
2.description: Crispy, golden-brown falafel made from ground chickpeas and herbs. Served with tahini sauce, fresh vegetables, and warm pita bread.

3.name: Shawarma Wrap
3.description: Thinly sliced marinated chicken or beef, slow-roasted on a vertical spit, wrapped in warm pita with garlic sauce, pickles, and fries.

4.name: Foul Medames
4.description: A traditional breakfast dish made from fava beans, cooked with garlic, lemon juice, and olive oil. Served with fresh vegetables.

5.name: Fresh Mint Lemonade
5.description: Refreshing homemade lemonade with fresh mint leaves, perfectly balanced between sweet and tangy.
